splash_startsub_title: nl:: the most recognized astrologer in the whole world
amanda_welcome: nl:: Welcome. I was expecting you...
amanda_amazing_vision: nl:: I see you came to me with a question in mind... You came to the right place. Please, answer a few questions to strengthen our connection.
amanda_your_dob: nl:: If you look back in life, would you consider yourself lucky?
amanda_your_gender: nl:: Have you ever been trully in love?
amanda_marital_status: nl:: Have you ever trully hated anyone?
amanda_signals: nl:: Yes.. I can see clearly now. How interesting..
amanda_would_you_future: nl:: Are you sure you would like to receive your future reading?
amanda_private_secure: nl:: To keep it private, I will send my vision details on your mobile phone.
amanda_accept_tnc: nl:: Please click SMS NOW button and confrim your chosen aspect of the reading
question_text: nl:: What do you want to know about?
